title: Black Tentacles
desc:
Post 934
- Squirming, ebony tentacles fill a 20-foot square on ground that you can see within range. For the duration, these tentacles turn the ground in the area into difficult terrain.
- Choose a player. On their turn, they draw a <:black:1106265022453268530> card and one of their non frozen cards becomes frozen, if all their cards are frozen, unfreeze all their cards and freeze one of their cards.
- This effect disappears after four turns.
- You lose 5 **Spell Slots.**
